link.definition: A saved URL with metadata (title, favicon, tags, memo)

tag.definition: A label for categorizing links, one link can have multiple tags

collection.definition: A named group of links (future feature)

read_later.definition: Flag indicating link is saved for future reading

share_link.definition: A URL that displays a link collection to others

export.definition: Converting link data to JSON/text format

import.definition: Loading links from external source (JSON, bookmarks)

ui_terms.popup: The small window shown when clicking extension icon
ui_terms.options_page: Full-page settings accessible from extension menu
ui_terms.card_view: Display links as visual cards with preview
ui_terms.list_view: Display links as compact text list
